Class Graph

    public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    simple graph which serves as a pre cursor to RDF

    aeb

      • collapsePredicate

        public void collapsePredicate(java.lang.String pred)
        shrinks a graph by merging subject and object of a given predicate. If the graph contains (x,y,s) (s,x,y) (s,p,o) (a,b,o) (o,a,b) and collapsePredicate(p) is called, the graph looks like this afterwards: (x,y,o) (o,x,y) (a,b,o) (o,a,b)

      • renameNode

        public void renameNode(Graph.Node oldNode,
              Graph.Node newNode)
        rename node - changes all triples that are affected (potentially all in case of a star shaped graph)

      • splitObject

        public void splitObject(java.lang.String pred,
               java.lang.String delimiterRegexp,
               java.lang.String... labels)
        sometimes object values are comma seperated lists: s p o1,o2,o3. This operation splits this statement into 3 statements s p o1, s p o2, s p o3. if labels are given, s p lat,lng can be split into s hasLat lat, s hasLng lng

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String s,
          java.lang.String p,
          java.lang.String o)
        remove edges. s,p,o values of null represent wildcards. thus, remove(null,null,null) deletes all edges

      • extractFactFromURI

        public void extractFactFromURI(java.lang.String regexp,
                      java.lang.String predicate)
        scans all URIs in the graph. If the URI matches the regexp, a new triple URI, prediate, matchValue is added
        Parameters:
        regexp -
        predicate -
